        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2517</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">My Favorite Animal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mein Lieblingstier</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mon Animal Préféré</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Meu Animal Favorito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Mio Animale Favorito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το αγαπημένο ζώο μου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mi Animal Preferido</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A simple internet based activity for pupils in middle school who research their favorite animal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">information skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein einfaches Internet gründete Aktivität für 
Schüler in der mittleren Schule, die ihr Lieblingstier erforschen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un Internet simple a basé l'activité pour les 
élèves dans le collège qui recherchent leur animal préféré.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um Internet simples baseou a atividade para os 
alunos na escola média que pesquisam seu animal favorito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un Internet semplice ha basato l'attività per 
gli allievi a scuola centrale che ricercano il loro animale favorito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα απλό Διαδίκτυο βάσισε τη δραστηριότητα για τους 
μαθητές στη δευτεροβάθμια εκπαίδευση που ερευνούν το αγαπημένο 
ζώο τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un Internet simple basó la actividad para las 
pupilas en escuela media que investigan su animal preferido.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
